content: We are focused on driving strong top line growth for both company-operated and franchised locations with $644 million in system-wide store sales for the quarter, which is nearly a 17% increase over prior year. Your line is open. Mike, please go ahead. Your line is open. And so when you take a look at the Valvoline Retail business over the last number of years, typically, the first half is going to deliver around 45% of the full-year EBITDA with the back half making up for that with increased leverage and increased volume. Your line is open. Mike, please go ahead. Your line is open.
